item.title: Add Formcake to forms section
item.description: https://formcake.com - Form backend for devs, free plan allows unlimited forms, 100 submissions, Zapier integration. No libraries or dependencies required.

item.title: added Mocklets
item.description: https://mocklets.com - a HTTP-based mock API simulator, which helps simulate APIs for faster parallel development and more comprehensive testing, with lifetime free tier.

item.title: Add DPLYR
item.description: https://www.dplyr.dev - Deploy Web Apps with Databases. Free for deploying on your machines. Maximum 2 deployments

item.title: Add Code Time to Miscellaneous
item.description: https://www.software.com/code-time - - an extension for time-tracking and coding metrics in VS Code, Atom, IntelliJ, Sublime Text, and more.

item.title: Add FunRetro
item.description: https://www.funretro.io/ - Free simple and intuitive sprint retrospective tool

item.title: Add Sheetson
item.description: https://sheetson.com - Instantly turn any Google Sheets into RESTful API. Free plan available.

item.title: Remove extra space
item.description: https://appcircle.io) — Automated mobile CI/CD/CT for iOS and Android with online device emulators. 20 minutes build timeout (60 mins for Open Source - Automated mobile CI/CD/CT for iOS and Android with online device emulators. 20 minutes build timeout (60 mins for Open Source) with single concurrency for free.
